content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-83.5)
- Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) with pickup position at (x=43.5, y=-81.5) and drop position at (x=43.5, y=-79.5)
- Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) 
- Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5)
- Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5)
- Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining with burner mining drill
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing to mine.
- Make sure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate.
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure there are ingredients to smelt in the furnace.
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure the pickup position has items to pick up.
### Errors when extracting items from chest
- Ensure the chest is not empty before extracting items.
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity has enough space to insert items.
- Ensure the item is compatible with the entity.
